segment.source: Description: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.
segment.target: Description: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.

segment.source: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.
segment.target: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.

segment.source: title: Windows Store app marketing guidelines
segment.target: title: Windows Store app marketing guidelines

segment.source: ms.assetid: CEB81E9D-5C64-458F-AAF1-C59BBBBB272E
segment.target: ms.assetid: CEB81E9D-5C64-458F-AAF1-C59BBBBB272E

segment.source: Windows Store app marketing guidelines
segment.target: Windows Store app marketing guidelines

segment.source: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.
segment.target: Learn how to promote your apps and content in the Windows Store.

segment.source: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.
segment.target: These guidelines cover how to use the assets that are available to you, along with recommendations for promoting your apps in print, TV, social media and digital advertising.

segment.source: Store badges
segment.target: Store badges

segment.source: We’ve created special promotional badges to help you drive more customers to your app's listing within the Windows Store.
segment.target: We’ve created special promotional badges to help you drive more customers to your app's listing within the Windows Store.

segment.source: These badges are available in 44 languages.
segment.target: These badges are available in 44 languages.

segment.source: Keep in mind that there are certain requirements you need to follow when using these images; these requirements, along with usage examples and guidelines, are available in a PDF file.
segment.target: Keep in mind that there are certain requirements you need to follow when using these images; these requirements, along with usage examples and guidelines, are available in a PDF file.

segment.source: Download button Windows Store Marketing Guidelines (PDF, English)
segment.target: Download button Windows Store Marketing Guidelines (PDF, English)

segment.source: Badge generator and images
segment.target: Badge generator and images

segment.source: You can use our badge generator to generate HTML that displays the Store badge (in the language of your choice) and links directly to your app's Store listing.
segment.target: You can use our badge generator to generate HTML that displays the Store badge (in the language of your choice) and links directly to your app's Store listing.

segment.source: You can also download the complete set of badge images (in PNG and PDF format) from the link below.
segment.target: You can also download the complete set of badge images (in PNG and PDF format) from the link below.

segment.source: Download button All badge images
segment.target: Download button All badge images

segment.source: Device images
segment.target: Device images

segment.source: To promote your app, you may want to show how it looks when running on a Windows device.
segment.target: To promote your app, you may want to show how it looks when running on a Windows device.

segment.source: We’ve got a variety of device chassis images for you to select from, including phones, tablets, laptops and PCs.
segment.target: We’ve got a variety of device chassis images for you to select from, including phones, tablets, laptops and PCs.

segment.source: Best practices and technical specifications for how to use these images can be found in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.
segment.target: Best practices and technical specifications for how to use these images can be found in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.

segment.source: Download button Windows device art
segment.target: Download button Windows device art

segment.source: License to Microsoft Marks
segment.target: License to Microsoft Marks

segment.source: Microsoft Marks means the Microsoft badge and the Windows Store tile described on the badge generator page.
segment.target: Microsoft Marks means the Microsoft badge and the Windows Store tile described on the badge generator page.

segment.source: To use these badges, you must:
segment.target: To use these badges, you must:

segment.source: Have your app or other content available in the Windows Store, or be part of the Microsoft Affiliate Program.
segment.target: Have your app or other content available in the Windows Store, or be part of the Microsoft Affiliate Program.

segment.source: If you are registered with Dev Center, comply with the “License to Microsoft Marks” section of the App Developer Agreement.
segment.target: If you are registered with Dev Center, comply with the “License to Microsoft Marks” section of the App Developer Agreement.

segment.source: If you are not registered with Windows Dev Center, Microsoft grants you a worldwide, nonexclusive, nontransferable, royalty-free license to use the badges solely as described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.
segment.target: If you are not registered with Windows Dev Center, Microsoft grants you a worldwide, nonexclusive, nontransferable, royalty-free license to use the badges solely as described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.

segment.source: Microsoft may change these guidelines, but if it does, Microsoft will use reasonable means to redirect you to any new URLs where these specifications are posted.
segment.target: Microsoft may change these guidelines, but if it does, Microsoft will use reasonable means to redirect you to any new URLs where these specifications are posted.

segment.source: Microsoft reserves all rights not expressly granted herein.
segment.target: Microsoft reserves all rights not expressly granted herein.

segment.source: Follow the logo usage specifications described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.
segment.target: Follow the logo usage specifications described in the Windows Store Marketing Guidelines.

segment.source: Microsoft is the sole owner of the Microsoft Marks and associated goodwill, and the sole beneficiary of the goodwill associated with your use of the Microsoft Marks.
segment.target: Microsoft is the sole owner of the Microsoft Marks and associated goodwill, and the sole beneficiary of the goodwill associated with your use of the Microsoft Marks.

segment.source: Microsoft may revoke this license at any time and at its sole discretion.
segment.target: Microsoft may revoke this license at any time and at its sole discretion.
